txt.en: Broken swords can be found scattered across the battlefield.\n\nYou should collect any broken swords that you find.
'Thank you for these broken swords, [placeholder]. This will keep the forge workers busy for a while and keep weapons in our hands during battle!'

'[placeholder], it is good to see you again. When Grimbeorn declared that we were to assist the dwarves, I knew that I must come here. During my time in Moria, I learned a great many things from the dwarves. Now I look to repay their hospitality by fighting along side them. If we make it to Gundabad, I am going in with them.\n\n'For now, I am focused with assisting the forge-workers, but they have informed me that metal to forge is becoming scarce. We should find more metals on the battlefield. Would you be able to traverse the battlefield and collect any broken weapons that you come across?'
Varthmath can be found at Zarkul-sul√ªn.\n\nYou should give the broken swords to Varthmath.
The Beorning Varthmath knows that supplies are limited in battle and wishes to scavenge the battlefield for weapons to repair.
Give the broken swords to Varthmath
